greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Lucas(n+1) + (3*(-1)^n - 1)/2.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,2,-1,-1)
formula: a(n) = Sum (L(2i+e), (i=0, 1, .., Floor(n/2))), where L(n) are Lucas numbers and e=2(n/2 - Floor(n/2)).
Convolution of L(n) with the sequence (1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, ...)
results.author: Mario Catalani (mario.catalani(AT)unito.it), Aug 22 2002
